body_html:
I don't think AMD FX CPU is a problem. But GTX 960 with 2 GB might be an
issue.
Thanks.

Junli

On Mon, Dec 7, 2015 at 9:03 PM, roschler notifications@github.com wrote:

I'm looking at buying a new PC to run TensorFlow on. The system I'm
looking at has an AMD FX processor and a GTX 960 with 2GB of memory. Will
TensorFlow run fine on that processor and be able to take advantage of the
GTX 960 for CUDA processing? The O/S I'm planning on is Ubuntu Linux.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#440.

Junli Gu--谷俊丽
Coordinated Science Lab
University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
